about.title: About ProAdmin Dashboard
about.description: A high-performance, resilient, and architecturally sound administration platform built for modern business needs.

security.title: Security First
security.desc: Implemented with robust JWT silent refresh logic, secure token storage, and a proactive request retry mechanism. Your sessions are automatically protected and managed with zero interruption to your workflow.

ux.title: Optimized UX
ux.desc: Powered by TanStack Query for high-speed data fetching. Features smooth loading skeletons, instant notifications, and a <1>mobile-first</1> responsive design that adapts seamlessly to any device.

arch.title: Solid Architecture
arch.desc: Strictly follows <1>Feature-Sliced Design (FSD)</1> principles. This ensures high cohesion and low coupling, making the codebase highly scalable, maintainable, and easy for large teams to collaborate on.

mission.title: System Mission
mission.desc: The mission of ProAdmin is to provide a standardized toolset for managing users, permissions, and analytics with absolute reliability. By combining cutting-edge frontend technologies with professional architectural patterns, we deliver an enterprise-ready dashboard experience.
